\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w gave|strong="H3289"\w* payment \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w* \w designs|strong="H6098"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* kept \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* effecting \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w purpose|strong="H6098"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w through|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3566"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w*, \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1867"\w* became \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w time|strong="H8462"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Ahasuerus|strong="H0325"\w*, \w when|strong="H3427"\w* \w he|strong="H3389"\w* \w first|strong="H8462"\w* became \w king|strong="H5921"\w*, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* put \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w record|strong="H3789"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* statement \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w*, \w Bishlam|strong="H1312"\w*, \w Mithredath|strong="H4990"\w*, \w Tabeel|strong="H2870"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rest|strong="H7605"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* friends, sent \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w letter|strong="H3791"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w*, \w writing|strong="H3789"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Aramaean \w writing|strong="H3789"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* language.

\w Rehum|strong="H7348"\w*, \w the|strong="H5922"\w* chief ruler, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w Shimshai|strong="H8124"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5613"\w*, sent \w a|strong="H2298"\w* \w letter|strong="H0104"\w* \w against|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*;

\w The|strong="H0116"\w* letter \w was|strong="H2942"\w* sent by \w Rehum|strong="H7348"\w*, \w the|strong="H0116"\w* chief ruler, \w and|strong="H0116"\w* \w Shimshai|strong="H8124"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5613"\w* \w and|strong="H0116"\w* their friends; \w the|strong="H0116"\w* Dinaites \w and|strong="H0116"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* Apharsathchites, \w the|strong="H0116"\w* Tarpelites, \w the|strong="H0116"\w* Apharsites, \w the|strong="H0116"\w* Archevites, \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w Babylonians|strong="H0896"\w*, \w the|strong="H0116"\w* Shushanchites, \w the|strong="H0116"\w* Dehaites, \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w Elamites|strong="H5962"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0524"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* \w of|strong="H5103"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w nations|strong="H0524"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w great|strong="H7229"\w* \w and|strong="H0524"\w* noble \w Osnappar|strong="H0620"\w* \w took|strong="H3488"\w* over \w and|strong="H0524"\w* put \w in|strong="H3488"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8115"\w* \w and|strong="H0524"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* \w of|strong="H5103"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* country over \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w river|strong="H5103"\w*:

\w This|strong="H1836"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w a|strong="H7972"\w* \w copy|strong="H6573"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w letter|strong="H0104"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*: \w Your|strong="H5922"\w* \w servants|strong="H5649"\w* living across \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w river|strong="H5103"\w* \w send|strong="H7972"\w* \w these|strong="H1836"\w* words:

\w We|strong="H1768"\w* give news \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w* \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w came|strong="H0858"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H4430"\w* \w come|strong="H0858"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* us at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*; \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w building|strong="H1124"\w* \w up|strong="H5559"\w* again \w that|strong="H1768"\w* uncontrolled \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w evil|strong="H0873"\w* town; \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w walls|strong="H7792"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* complete \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* joining \w up|strong="H5559"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* bases.

\w The|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* may \w be|strong="H1934"\w* certain \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w when|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w building|strong="H1124"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w this|strong="H1791"\w* town \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w its|strong="H3046"\w* \w walls|strong="H7792"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* complete, \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w give|strong="H5415"\w* \w no|strong="H3809"\w* \w tax|strong="H4061"\w* \w or|strong="H2006"\w* payment \w in|strong="H4430"\w* goods \w or|strong="H2006"\w* forced payments, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* end \w it|strong="H2006"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w be|strong="H1934"\w* \w a|strong="H1934"\w* cause \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w loss|strong="H5142"\w* \w to|strong="H5142"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w*.

Further, there \w have|strong="H4430"\w* been great \w kings|strong="H4430"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, ruling \w over|strong="H5922"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* country across \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, \w to|strong="H5922"\w* whom they \w gave|strong="H3052"\w* \w taxes|strong="H4061"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* payments \w in|strong="H5922"\w* goods \w and|strong="H4430"\w* forced payments.

\w Give|strong="H7761"\w* an order \w now|strong="H3705"\w*, \w that|strong="H2942"\w* \w these|strong="H0479"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* are \w to|strong="H2942"\w* do \w nothing|strong="H3809"\w* \w more|strong="H4481"\w*, \w and|strong="H7149"\w* \w that|strong="H2942"\w* \w the|strong="H1124"\w* \w building|strong="H1124"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H1124"\w* town \w is|strong="H7149"\w* \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w be|strong="H3705"\w* \w stopped|strong="H0989"\w*, till \w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w give|strong="H7761"\w* an order.

\w Be|strong="H1934"\w* certain \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w do|strong="H5648"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w with|strong="H5922"\w* all care: \w do|strong="H5648"\w* not let trouble \w be|strong="H1934"\w* increased \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* king's \w damage|strong="H5142"\w*.

\w So|strong="H0116"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w work|strong="H5673"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w at|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w* came \w to|strong="H5705"\w* an end; \w so|strong="H0116"\w* it \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w stopped|strong="H0989"\w*, till \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w second|strong="H8648"\w* \w year|strong="H8140"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* rule \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w*, \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Persia|strong="H6540"\w*.
